attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Britain Britain Britain" as Tom Baker likes to say. 

I ask the people of Britain to say "NO" to the idea of Scottish Independence and ask you to take a moment to consider the following point.

England & Scotland have their historic differences, yes that's a fact although, we ultimately work well together with each country bringing its own attributes to the 300 year partnership and would be along time divorced if independence ever became a reality. 

If you agree please add your name to the petition below and thank you for your time.
